message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, I believe it would be valuable to you. I am offering this exceptional item for $20000. Let me know if you're interested in discussing further details.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $15000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I appreciate your feedback. I am willing to negotiate the price down to $17500. Please let me know if this is within your budget.
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $14000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I understand your position, Bob. I am willing to consider $15500 for the product. This is my final offer in this negotiation.
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $13000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Considering your latest offer, I am willing to negotiate at $14500 for the product. This is my final offer.
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12500. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your continued interest, Bob. Considering your last offer, I am willing to sell the product at $14000. This is my final offer.
I'm really interested in the product, and I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm offering $13000 for the product. This is my final offer.
